title: Pose Classifier with PoseNet and ml5.neuralNetwork()
description: This tutorial combines PoseNet and ml5.neuralNetwork(). I use the output of the pre-trained model (the "pose" itself) as the inputs to an ml5.js neural network classifier.

timestamps.title: Let's look at the json file

codeExamples.title: Pose Estimation
codeExamples.description: This sketch contains all the steps for the Pose Classifier

codeExamples.title: Data Collection
codeExamples.description: Code for data collection in the p5.js Web Editor.

codeExamples.title: Model Deployment
codeExamples.description: Code for loading and deploying the trained model.

links.title: ml5.js Pose Estimation with PoseNet
links.description: In this video I cover pose estimation: finding the keypoints of person's pose and skeleton using the pre-trained machine learning model PoseNet (in JavaScript with p5.js and ml5.js).

links.title: ml5: Neural Network Regression
links.description: In this video I cover how to train a neural network to perform a "regression" task (rather than classification).

links.title: Train Your Own Neural Network
links.description: This video covers how to train a neural network machine learning model with real-time interactive data in ml5.js

links.title: Teachable Machine
links.description: In this video, I train an image classifier and import the machine learning model into a p5.js sketch with the ml5.js library.

links.title: JavaScript setTimeout() Function
links.description: This video covers the setTimeout() function in JavaScript in the context of p5.js.  setTimeout() allows you to execute a given function at a specific time (in milliseconds.)
